Title: Relates to protections for victims of real property theft
Summary: Relates to protections for victims of real property theft, providing for a rebuttable presumption that a purchaser or incumbrancer has notice of fraud or fraudulent intent in certain circumstances.
LawCode: Amd ยง266, RP L; amd ยง6501, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to protections for victims of real property theft
